title: Diamond Mangalsutra Necklace - Traditional Thaali Bottu Design
materials: G-H Color). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Delicate mangalsutra featuring a strand of traditional black beads interspersed with intricately designed diamond-studded rose gold pendants. The pendants boast a floral motif design set with brilliant-cut diamonds. The delicate gold detailing adds a modern twist to the classic Thaali Bottu.
description: A modern take on a timeless symbol of marriage, this mangalsutra combines the traditional significance of black beads with the contemporary elegance of rose gold and diamonds. The delicate design makes it perfect for everyday wear, while the high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty. Exquisite Hyderabadi craftsmanship guarantees a unique and durable piece.
